title: Emma: A Victorian Romance
alternative_title: Eikoku Koi Monogatari Emma, 英國戀物語エマ
description: In late 19th century London, William Jones, a member of the gentry, meets and falls in love with Emma, and she with him. This chance meeting overturns both their lives - for Emma is a maid, and the barriers of class and wealth stand between them.
genre: [<Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Seinen>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
